traditional-popcorn-J.name: Traditional Popcorn
traditional-popcorn-J.description: Freshly made popcorn from a variety of traditional popping corns and slathered with hot butter. A delicous savoury treat.
pesto-shrimp-squash-J.name: Pesto Shrimp Squash
pesto-shrimp-squash-J.description: Baked spaghetti squash 'noodles' tossed in pesto sauce and topped with delicious saut√©ed shrimp.
three-sisters-soup-J.name: Three Sisters Soup
three-sisters-soup-J.description: A hearty traditional soup made from the Three Sisters: squash, corn, and beans.
hazelnut-squash-soup-J.name: Hazelnut Squash Soup
hazelnut-squash-soup-J.description: A delicate soup of roasted butternut squash, parsnip, and leeks, topped with delicious roasted hazelnuts.
